DOC.brief_summary: This study perform reveal safety feasibility combination therapy autologous cord blood mononuclear cell ( CB ) G-CSF well repeat administration G-CSF child cerebral palsy . The evaluation tool follow : ( 1 ) Developmental test ( DDST , PEDI , GMFM , GMFCS , MACS , QUEST ) , ( 2 ) Neurocognitive function test ( WPPSI-IV ) , ( 3 ) Brain MRI-DTI , ( 4 ) Peripheral blood CD34+ cell count , ( 5 ) Neurotrophic factors/anti-inflammatory cytokine .
DOC.brief_title: G-CSF Autologous Cord Blood Infusion Cerebral Palsy
